hadith.text: Narrated Umm Salamah: That she brought a side of roasted meat to the Messenger of Allah (ï·º), so he ate it from it and stood for Salat, and did not perform Wudu' He said: There are narrations on this topic from 'Abdullah bin Al-Harith, Al-Mughirah, and Abu Rafi' [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih Gharib from this route
